titles.title: Defense Acquisition Decision Making Streamlining Act of 2019
Defense Acquisition Decision Making Streamlining Act of 2019
A bill to provide for pilot programs to streamline decision-making process for weapon systems.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Defense Acquisition Decision Making Streamlining Act of 2019
This bill requires each Service Acquisition Executive to recommend to the Department of Defense at least one major defense acquisition program for a skunk works pilot program for accelerated acquisition.
